arguments.text:
Whistleblower Policy

Purpose: To provide a clear, confidential, and protected process for employees to report suspected misconduct.

Definitions:
- Whistleblower: Any employee who reports a violation in good faith.
- Protected Activity: Reporting, cooperating, or participating in an investigation.

Obligations:
1. All reports must be submitted via the secure portal or directly to the Compliance Officer.
2. The organization will investigate all reports promptly and confidentially.
3. No retaliation will be tolerated against any whistleblower.

Procedures:
- Submit report through https://compliance.example.com/whistleblower.
- The Compliance Officer acknowledges receipt within 48 hours.
- An investigation team is assigned within 5 business days.
- Findings are reported to senior management and appropriate corrective actions are taken.

Enforcement: Violations of this policy may result in disciplinary action, up to termination.
